goal_name: A nation that ensures our food and nutrition security needs are adequately met for all people through increasing sustainable food production systems and improving household production
target_name: Reduce reliance on food imports through import substitution for food products that can be produced domestically
indicator_name: Total annual volume of imports of food and products targeted by DARD as those that can be produced domestically (including ‘value-added products)
GoalDescription: A nation that ensures our food and nutrition security needs are adequately met for all people through increasing sustainable food production systems and improving household production
PolicyObjectiveDescription: Reduce reliance on food imports through import substitution for food products that can be produced domestically
IndicatorDescription: Total annual volume of imports of food and products targeted by DARD as those that can be produced domestically (including ‘value-added products)
ComputationMethod: Total Number of Imported foods that Vanuatu can Produce domestically in the Country.
Concept: Department of Agriculture and Rural Development have to work and decrease number of imported foods that Vanuatu can Produce domestically.
DataSource: DARD-Department of Agriculture and Rural Development (Administrative Data)
Definition: Annual Volume of imports of food and products targeted by the Department of Agriculture and Rural Development (DARD) that can be produced domestically in Vanuatu.
IndicatorShortName: Volume of Domestically Produced Food Imports
Rationale: Importing of food costs, the country a lot of money every year, Vanuatu consumes a lot of imported food, this cause high number of Non-Communicable Disease (NCD) affecting most people in the communities.
graph_title: Total annual volume of imports of food and products targeted by DARD as those that can be produced domestically (including ‘value-added products)
